info.title: Queue OpenAPI for fal-ai/flux-2
info.description: The OpenAPI schema for the fal-ai/flux-2 queue.

examples: Dutch angle close-up of a survivor in post-apocalyptic setting, dust-covered face, dramatic harsh sunlight creating deep shadows, happy expression, desaturated dystopian color palette, gritty realism
prompt.description: The prompt to generate an image from.
prompt.title: Prompt

num_images.description: The number of images to generate.
num_images.title: Number of Images

image_size.description: The size of the image to generate. The width and height must be between 512 and 2048 pixels.
image_size.title: Image Size

acceleration.description: The acceleration level to use for the image generation.
acceleration.title: Acceleration

output_format.description: The format of the generated image.
output_format.title: Output Format

sync_mode.description: If `True`, the media will be returned as a data URI and the output data won't be available in the request history.
sync_mode.title: Sync Mode

guidance_scale.description: Guidance Scale is a measure of how close you want the model to stick to your prompt when looking for a related image to show you.
guidance_scale.title: Guidance Scale

seed.description: The seed to use for the generation. If not provided, a random seed will be used.
seed.title: Seed

enable_prompt_expansion.description: If set to true, the prompt will be expanded for better results.
enable_prompt_expansion.title: Enable Prompt Expansion

num_inference_steps.description: The number of inference steps to perform.
num_inference_steps.title: Number of Inference Steps

enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, the safety checker will be enabled.
enable_safety_checker.title: Enable Safety Checker

prompt.description: The prompt used for generating the image.
prompt.title: Prompt

seed.description:
Seed of the generated Image. It will be the same value of the one passed in the
            input or the randomly generated that was used in case none was passed.
seed.title: Seed

has_nsfw_concepts.description: Whether the generated images contain NSFW concepts.
has_nsfw_concepts.title: Has Nsfw Concepts

height.description: The height of the generated image.
height.title: Height

width.description: The width of the generated image.
width.title: Width

file_size.description: The size of the file in bytes.
file_size.title: File Size

url.description: The URL where the file can be downloaded from.
url.title: Url

file_name.description: The name of the file. It will be auto-generated if not provided.
file_name.title: File Name

content_type.description: The mime type of the file.
content_type.title: Content Type

schema.description: Whether to include logs (`1`) in the response or not (`0`).

success.description: Whether the request was cancelled successfully.
